Aid Tips & Notes for BG3

Upcast: When cast with a 3rd level spell slot or higher, the hit points are increased by 5 for each slot level above 2nd. It is generally considered one of the most efficient spells to upcast and a very good way to start you day of adventuring. This health maximum isn't considered temporary hit points and stack with such sources, e.g. the Battle Master Rally.
